title: Milli Vanilli - Girl You Know It's True [FLAC+MP3](Big Papi) 198
description:
Source: CD + Fresh Cover Art Scan

[quote]
From WikiPedia

In 1989, several songs from Milli Vanilli's Europe-only release All or Nothing were repackaged and retitled Girl You Know It's True. 

Following the scandal that revealed that Rob Pilatus and Fab Morvan did not sing on their album exposed by Los Angeles Times journalist Chuck Philips, Arista Records dropped the act from its roster and deleted their album and its masters from their catalog, [i]making it one of the largest-selling albums to ever be taken out of print.[/i] 

[b]Following the series of stories by journalist Chuck Philips, the Academy revoked their Grammy. This was the first time a Grammy was ever rescinded.[/b][/quote]
